name: What Was Lost
description:
What was lost 

It’s a platformer with souls-like elements, such as respawning enemies, tough stages to complete and of course if you die, you will have to start again. Take on the role of one of the last rune keepers, a lone monk on whom the fate of the entire world will rest. 

Controls: 

A – Move left 

D – Move Right 

W – Jump (W+W for double jump) 

J – Attack K – Hold to gain projectiles resistance but it makes you very vurnerable in close combat 

L – Drink first potion 

P – Drink second potion 

E – Interact Space – Hold to roll 

Features: 

- A souls-like platformer 

- 2 different levels 

- Ending depending on choice 

- Retro-stylised pixel art.

Average game time:

15-20 minutes

Our speedrun attempts, can you beat us?

Kannen283: 4:56

GrabS00N: 5:00

LeeRuss: continue trying
